exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros A dom. unfold PartialOrder, eq, incl. intros equ preo x y. intros Hleq Hleq'. unfold relation_conjunction. split. - intros Hxy. unfold relation_equivalence in Hleq, Hleq'. unfold flip in Hleq'. unfold relation_conjunction in Hleq'. destruct Hleq as [Heq _]. specialize (Heq A dom x y). unfold relation_conjunction in Heq. destruct Heq as [Heqx _]. apply Heqx. apply Hleq'. apply Hxy. - intros Hxy. unfold relation_equivalence in Hleq, Hleq'. unfold flip in Hleq'. unfold relation_conjunction in Hleq'. destruct Hleq as [_ Hleq _]. specialize (Hleq A dom y x). unfold relation_conjunction in Hleq. destruct Hleq as [_ Hleqy]. apply Hleqy. apply Hleq'. apply Hxy.
